definitions.definition: a planned occasion when people come together to discuss something:
examples: We're having a meeting on Thursday to discuss the problem.

definitions.definition: an occasion when people meet each other, especially when this was not planned:
examples: A chance (= not intended) meeting with a publisher on an airplane had launched his career.

definitions.definition: a group of people who have met for a particular purpose:
examples: The meeting wants to look at the proposal again.
